TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Monating, title = Monating, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monating} }

S.FORM: Monating Itiniay i Fuli Cen no Hualien ko Monating a niyaro', 68 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 276 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. | 59% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 164 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 41% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 112 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 58%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Monating Itiniay i Foli Cen no Hoalien ko Monating a niyaro', 68 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 276 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. | 59% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 164 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 41% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 112 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 58%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
